channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot hole repair sub standard, 13th February
item.description:
Pothole has been repaired but contractor had done sub standard job which will lead to rapid deterioration

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 24 Cleeve View Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large potholes, 13th February
item.description:
I reported this on Friday I have a had an email to say job is complete when it isn't the lads have been today and done the potholes that had spray paint around them but not these ones also there is loads of smaller holes by the ones that have been done today why don't they get done at the same time ?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 22 Vertican Road, Innsworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous Street lights not working, 13th February
item.description:
Numerous Street lights not working since the road was dug up recently for the new Fibre cables...
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Manor Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gang grafitti, 13th February
item.description:
'Crasher' tag on wall. The same tag is written on the bridge on Poole way and various other places around St Paul's.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Saint Paul's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars parking on pavements, blocking dropped curbs, 13th February
item.description:
Three cars constantly park on the pavement, blocking pavements and dropped curbs on both sides of the road for wheelchairs/prams/partially sighted users. Wardens patrol regularly, but these never seem to get a ticket, even though they are parked on the pavement where double yellow lines are on the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 47 Swindon Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sinkhole and potholes, 13th February
item.description:
Sinkhole has had a barrier around it for over eight months, taking up a parking space (for which we pay a permit). Potholes in the road next to it are worsening too.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 12 Granville Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Burned out, 13th February
item.description:
Vehicle burned out in bushes on a public right of way

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Coberley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Filthy pavements,litter,overgrown pavement, 13th February
item.description:
Visiting this neighbourhood and it’s an absolute disgrace The pavements are covered in rubbish,leaves and full dog bags hanging in trees
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 May Trees Lansdown Crescent, Cheltenham

item.title: Large and deep pothole., 11th February
item.description:
This pothole has been here for several weeks, it’s large enough to wreck a tyre and is also really dangerous for cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 111 Old Bath Road, Cheltenham

item.title: From Two Hedges Road end of Kayte Lane to Bishops Cleeve Football Club there are numerous potholes., 11th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Bon Idee Kayte Lane, Bishops Cleeve

item.title: Abanonded small motor bike (DF70XBU), 9th February
item.description:
It has been there, in the corner, unmoved as far as I can tell, for a couple of months. Not parked in a bay, no sign of parking having been paid.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 The Mews Upper Bath Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
